## Source files {.tabset}

<!-- To add a download link, use the following format:
<a href="path/to/file" download style="color:blue">Download ____</a>

NOTE: All fish files should be in the folder fish_plots, and all benthic files should be in XXXXX. Both zip files should be remade when R scripts are added to the folders, and a note should be made at the top of updates.RMD with the date.
-->

When downloading R scripts to source, be aware that if you have previously downloaded scripts and edited them that you can overwrite any changes by downloading all files as a zip. <br>
It is reccomended to only download files you do not already have downloaded, especially if you have made edits.
